conclusion: Determine the position of the particle at t = 8 seconds by calculating displacement using the v-t graph.

Identify segments of the v-t graph: t = 0 to 1s (velocity 0 to 2 m/s), t = 1 to 3s (velocity constant at 2 m/s), t = 3 to 4s (velocity 2 to 0 m/s), t = 4 to 5s (velocity 0 to -1 m/s), t = 5 to 7s (velocity constant at -1 m/s), t = 7 to 8s (velocity -1 to 0 m/s).
Calculate area for segment 1 (t = 0 to 1s): Area = 1 m.
Calculate area for segment 2 (t = 1 to 3s): Area = 4 m.
Calculate area for segment 3 (t = 3 to 4s): Area = 1 m.
Calculate area for segment 4 (t = 4 to 5s): Area = -0.5 m.
Calculate area for segment 5 (t = 5 to 7s): Area = -2 m.
Calculate area for segment 6 (t = 7 to 8s): Area = -0.5 m.
Sum the areas to find total displacement: Total displacement = 3 m.
Determine final position: Initial position = 5 m, final position = 8 m.
